p: The comparative analysis of essential oils from both Prunus species revealed the presence of ( E)-2-hexenal, limonene, linalool, ( E)-β-ionone, and manoyl oxide only in P. armeniaca oils. On the other hand, benzaldehyde, p-mentha-2,4(8)-diene, trans-β-farnesene, tetradecanoic acid, hexadecanoic acid, triacontane, and entriacontane were identified only in P. domestica essential oils.
